QuestData.Title: Gatekeepers of Auchindoun
QuestData.Description: Auchindoun is under attack, stranger, and I intend to help defend it.$B$BThe only problem is the only armor I could find was my grandfather's old set, and it isn't nearly enough to defeat the spirits blocking the path toward Auchindoun.$B$BWould you defeat them and let me through the gate with you? I will find a way to repay you!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Vindicator Dalu and Soulbinder Halaari.
QuestData.CompletionText: I will defend Auchindoun with my life. We cannot lose anymore in this war!
QuestData.RewardText: You have my eternal gratitude, hero. I will find a way to repay you someday.
